name: Prototype 13 (tesla, akill)
description:
Enter your initial values for your robot and watch it fail miserably. 

Upgrade your sensors and servos to make better progress. 

Good Luck!

There are some issues but they are not show breaker. We will update the game when the voting ends. Thank you for playing.

Known Issues: 

  • Death by timer bug: The failure message box info text is wrong, it says "Crash" but it should be "Time is up!"
  • Win-Lose-Timer bug: Even if you lost by time, you may still win the game if your buggy enters the finish line.
